What bug is being fixed?

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change)
- [ ] Hotfix (urgent critical issue)

## Related Issue
Link to the related issue:  
`Fixes #issue-number`

## Root Cause
Explain the reason behind the bug.

## Solution
Describe how you fixed it.

## Testing
Explain how you tested the bugfix.
